alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland Nassau; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:19AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Nassau, eastern Bradford, east central Alachua, western St. Johns, eastern Baker, northern Putnam, Clay, Duval, southern Camden and southeastern Charlton Counties through NOON EDT... At 1119 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Stephen Foster State Park to 6 miles west of Bryceville to near Hawthorne. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Palatka, Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Starke, Hilliard, Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Callahan and East Palatka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
